Y-axis titled 'GJ' for a linear scale with values from 0 to 100
Title text 'The Rise of King Coal'
Subtitle text 'Energy consumption per capita in England and Wales. Source: Wrigley (2013)'
g.text: Energy consumption per capita in England and Wales. Source: Wrigley (2013)
